com.enjin.sdk.schemas.player

Class PlayerSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enjin.sdk.schemas.BaseSchema
      • com.enjin.sdk.schemas.shared.SharedSchema
        • com.enjin.sdk.schemas.player.PlayerSchema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayerSchema, ISharedSchema
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerClient

    public class PlayerSchema
extends SharedSchema
implements IPlayerSchema
    Class for sending requests in the player schema.
